channel.title: Classpaths, Javacs, Servers and Echos
channel.description:
I'm using WhiteScape to make my server, but i had this problem with PimpScape and TestScape as well. When I press Run&Compile, this comes up:
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. '-cp' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. The system cannot find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
When I press edit on the batch file (right click on it --> Edit), this is what is inside:
[code]@echo off COLOR 08 title slomiscape.no-ip.info Server "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.5.0_09/bin/javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin/java" slomiscape.no-ip.info pause [/code]
Can anybody help? Who ever helps, gets to be a mod if they wish.
(Yes jay, your still gonna be a mod)

item.title: Classpaths, Javacs, Servers and Echos
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

that doset make any sense. Run&Compile is 1 file…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 09, 2006, 09:12:06 PM[/size][hr]compile dosen’t work, because C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe dosen’t exist lol.

but runserver kind of works, it says:

Starting WhiteScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

than just sits there, not doing anything…

Read full topic

item.title: Classpaths, Javacs, Servers and Echos
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

Compile:

@echo off
color f0
title ScapeScape Server
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

Run Server:

@echo off
title ScapeScape
color f0
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Don’t put them together, if you have Compile and Run then you can only have like 4 people on the server.

Read full topic
